God of WisdomAnswered on 29 Jun 2019If you count CPF as part of net worth, I think I hit $100K by 27-28, and that is with a mixture of both CPF, cash and investments.If you're talking about liquid assets, then probably around age 30-31.0 comments6
Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 29 Jun 2019Excluding CPF - liquid assets of 100k at 23.0 comments1
